parameter.name: root
parameter.description: Relative to which path is specified. Valid values are sandbox and dropbox.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The path to the file you want to retrieve.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The metadata returned on successful upload will have its size field translated based on the given locale.

parameter.name: overwrite
parameter.description: This value, either true (default) or false, determines what happens when there's already a file at the specified path.

parameter.name: parentRev
parameter.description: The revision of the file you're editing. If parent_rev matches the latest version of the file on the user's Dropbox, that file will be replaced.

parameter.name: contentLength
parameter.description: The metadata returned on successful upload will have its size field translated based on the given locale.
